description: List of Captain Nibbu's intro dialogs with corresponding image index

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: I am the fabulous and fluffy CAPTAIN NIBBU!!!!!

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: I will help you eradicate all the unneeded, untrendy memories. Flush them right down the toilet.

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: EVIL MEMORIES, YOU SHALL NOT SEE THE LIGHT AGAIN!!

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: Sorry, got a little carried away there. Alright, now that I’m done with my intro, here’s the dealio.

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: I’ve already gone ahead and downloaded all your memories. What I see is that you have lots of memories, in fact, TOO MANY. Your storage is at max cap.

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: Obviously, you must already know this. That’s why you’re here. You need more memory storage.

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: Don’t look too far because this is what Memorywash is for!  The app is optimized to help you sort out the good memories from the bad.

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: We will pair an older, irrelevant memory with a newer, trendier one. We can’t delete memories for you, so at the end of the day, you choose the one you want to keep.

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: But remember, you can only keep ONE of the two, capisce?!!? Like this, we can cut down on the memories you don’t need.

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: We’ll keep doing this until you have sufficient memory storage to live happily forever.

dialogs.speaker: Captain Nibbu
dialogs.dialog: We are going to have a fantastic showdown!!!! Let the Memorywash begin.
